title: I misspelled my name
body: So i tried to make it Mera Mera No Mi and i misspeled. is there anything that i can do ??

replies.body: Yh i would but the support site doesnt work

Thanks for the heads up!  It looks like the platform our ticketing center uses is currently experiencing an outage, so you might run into an error accessing a ticket or article.  I don't have an eta on restoration yet, but will keep an eye out.

The only time we'll really change a name is if it's offensive, otherwise a name change can be purchased through the store.   I can't make any guarantees but since your name change was so recent, maybe we can work something out.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll help individually.  Again, no guarantees but worth a shot!
